title: Time - The 100 best movies of the past 10 decades - 1920s

movies.overview: France, on the eve of the French Revolution. Henriette and Louise have been raised together as sisters. When the plague that takes their parents' lives causes Louise's blindness, they decide to travel to Paris in search of a cure, but they separate when a lustful aristocrat crosses their path.
movies.title: Orphans of the Storm

movies.overview: This pioneering documentary film depicts the lives of the indigenous Inuit people of Canada's northern Quebec region. Although the production contains some fictional elements, it vividly shows how its resourceful subjects survive in such a harsh climate, revealing how they construct their igloo homes and find food by hunting and fishing. The film also captures the beautiful, if unforgiving, frozen landscape of the Great White North, far removed from conventional civilization.
movies.title: Nanook of the North

movies.overview: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.
movies.title: The Thief of Bagdad

movies.original_title: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
movies.overview: A married farmer falls under the spell of a slatternly woman from the city, who tries to convince him to drown his wife.
movies.title: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans

movies.overview: A classic of the silent age, this film tells the story of the doomed but ultimately canonized 15th-century teenage warrior. On trial for claiming she'd spoken to God, Jeanne d'Arc is subjected to inhumane treatment and scare tactics at the hands of church court officials. Initially bullied into changing her story, Jeanne eventually opts for what she sees as the truth. Her punishment, a famously brutal execution, earns her perpetual martyrdom.
movies.title: The Passion of Joan of Arc

movies.overview: The just-out-of-college, effete son of a no-nonsense steamboat captain comes to visit his father whom he's not seen since he was a child.
movies.title: Steamboat Bill, Jr.

movies.overview: Lulu is a young woman so beautiful and alluring that few can resist her siren charms. The men drawn into her web include respectable newspaper publisher Dr. Ludwig Schön, his musical producer son Alwa, circus performer Rodrigo Quast, and seedy old Schigolch. When Lulu's charms inevitably lead to tragedy, the downward spiral encompasses them all.
movies.title: Pandora's Box
